text: Lloyd John Ogilvie (September 2, 1930 - June 5, 2019)Marquis Who's Who on the WebTributes Delivered in Congress to Chaplain Lloyd John Ogilvie To Commemorate His Service in the United States Senate , United States Senate, 108th Congress, First Session, S. Doc. 108-4, United States Government Printing Office, 2003, retrieved 2008-06-19 was an American Presbyterian minister. He was born in Kenosha, Wisconsin. He was Chaplain of the United States Senate from 104th through 107th Congresses from 1995 to 2003. Ogilvie died on June 5, 2019 at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American Presbyterian ministers Category:People from Kenosha, Wisconsin
title: Lloyd John Ogilvie
